verses.verse: And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Send <WH7971> <WH8798> thou men <WH582>, that they may search <WH8446> <WH8799> the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>, which I give <WH5414> <WH8802> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>: of every <WH376> tribe <WH4294> of their fathers <WH1> shall ye send <WH7971> <WH8799> a man <WH259>, every one a ruler <WH5387> among them.

And Mosheh <WH4872> by the Mitzvah <WH6310> of the YY <WH3068> sent <WH7971> <WH8799> them from the wilderness <WH4057> of Paran <WH6290>: all those men <WH582> were <WH1992> heads <WH7218> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
And these were their names <WH8034>: of the tribe <WH4294> of Re'uven <WH7205>, Shammua <WH8051> the son <WH1121> of Zaccur <WH2139>.
Of the tribe <WH4294> of SHim`on <WH8095>, Shaphat <WH8202> the son <WH1121> of Hori <WH2753>.
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, Kalev <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Y'funeh <WH3312>.
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Yissakhar <WH3485>, Igal <WH3008> the son <WH1121> of Yosef <WH3130>.
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Efrayim <WH669>, Oshea <WH1954> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>.
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Binyamin <WH1144>, Palti <WH6406> the son <WH1121> of Raphu <WH7505>.
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Z'vulun <WH2074>, Gaddiel <WH1427> the son <WH1121> of Sodi <WH5476>.
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Yosef <WH3130>, namely, of the tribe <WH4294> of M'nasheh <WH4519>, Gaddi <WH1426> the son <WH1121> of Susi <WH5485>.
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Dan <WH1835>, Ammiel <WH5988> the son <WH1121> of Gemalli <WH1582>.
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Asher <WH836>, SHetur <WH5639> the son <WH1121> of Mikha'el <WH4317>.
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Naftali <WH5321>, Nahbi <WH5147> the son <WH1121> of Vophsi <WH2058>.
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Gad <WH1410>, Geuel <WH1345> the son <WH1121> of Machi <WH4352>.

These are the names <WH8034> of the men <WH582> which Mosheh <WH4872> sent <WH7971> <WH8804> to spy out <WH8446> <WH8800> the land <WH776>. And Mosheh <WH4872> called <WH7121> <WH8799> Oshea <WH1954> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126> Jehoshua <WH3091>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> sent <WH7971> <WH8799> them to spy out <WH8446> <WH8800> the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Get you up <WH5927> <WH8798> this way southward <WH5045>, and go up <WH5927> <WH8804> into the mountain <WH2022>:

And see <WH7200> <WH8804> the land <WH776>, what it is; and the people <WH5971> that dwelleth <WH3427> <WH8802> therein, whether they be strong <WH2389> or weak <WH7504>, few <WH4592> or many <WH7227>;

And what the land <WH776> is that they dwell in <WH3427> <WH8802>, whether it be good <WH2896> or bad <WH7451>; and what cities <WH5892> they be that they dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> in <WH2007>, whether in tents <WH4264>, or in strong holds <WH4013>;

And what the land <WH776> is, whether it be fat <WH8082> or lean <WH7330>, whether there be <WH3426> wood <WH6086> therein, or not. And be ye of good courage <WH2388> <WH8694>, and bring <WH3947> <WH8804> of the fruit <WH6529> of the land <WH776>. Now the time <WH3117> was the time <WH3117> of the firstripe <WH1061> grapes <WH6025>.
So they went up <WH5927> <WH8799>, and searched <WH8446> <WH8799> the land <WH776> from the wilderness <WH4057> of Zin <WH6790> unto Rehob <WH7340>, as men come <WH935> <WH8800> to Hamath <WH2574>.

And they ascended <WH5927> <WH8799> by the south <WH5045>, and came <WH935> <WH8799> unto Hevron <WH2275>; where Ahiman <WH289>, Sheshai <WH8344>, and Talmai <WH8526>, the children <WH3211> of Anak <WH6061>, were. (Now Hevron <WH2275> was built <WH1129> <WH8738> seven <WH7651> years <WH8141> before <WH6440> Zoan <WH6814> in Egypt <WH4714>.)

And they came <WH935> <WH8799> unto the brook <WH5158> of Eshcol <WH812>, and cut down <WH3772> <WH8799> from thence a branch <WH2156> with one <WH259> cluster <WH811> of grapes <WH6025>, and they bare <WH5375> <WH8799> it between two <WH8147> upon a staff <WH4132>; and they brought of the pomegranates <WH7416>, and of the figs <WH8384>.

The place <WH4725> was called <WH7121> <WH8804> the brook <WH5158> Eshcol <WH812>, because of <WH182> the cluster of grapes <WH811> which the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> cut down <WH3772> <WH8804> from thence.
And they returned <WH7725> <WH8799> from searching <WH8446> <WH8800> of the land <WH776> after <WH7093> forty <WH705> days <WH3117>.

And they went <WH3212> <WH8799> and came <WH935> <WH8799> to Mosheh <WH4872>, and to Aharon <WH175>, and to all the congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, unto the wilderness <WH4057> of Paran <WH6290>, to Kadesh <WH6946>; and brought back <WH7725> <WH8686> word <WH1697> unto them, and unto all the congregation <WH5712>, and shewed <WH7200> <WH8686> them the fruit <WH6529> of the land <WH776>.

And they told <WH5608> <WH8762> him, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, We came <WH935> <WH8804> unto the land <WH776> whither thou sentest <WH7971> <WH8804> us, and surely it floweth <WH2100> <WH8802> with milk <WH2461> and honey <WH1706>; and this is the fruit <WH6529> of it.

Nevertheless <WH657> the people <WH5971> be strong <WH5794> that dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> in the land <WH776>, and the cities <WH5892> are walled <WH1219> <WH8803>, and very <WH3966> great <WH1419>: and moreover we saw <WH7200> <WH8804> the children <WH3211> of Anak <WH6061> there.

The Amalekites <WH6002> dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> in the land <WH776> of the south <WH5045>: and the Hittites <WH2850>, and the Y'vusis <WH2983>, and the Amorites <WH567>, dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> in the mountains <WH2022>: and the Kanahanites <WH3669> dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> by the sea <WH3220>, and by the coast <WH3027> of Yarden <WH3383>.

And Kalev <WH3612> stilled <WH2013> <WH8686> the people <WH5971> before Mosheh <WH4872>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Let us go up <WH5927> <WH8799> at once <WH5927> <WH8800>, and possess <WH3423> <WH8804> it; for we are well able <WH3201> <WH8799> to overcome <WH3201> <WH8800> it.

But the men <WH582> that went up <WH5927> <WH8804> with him said <WH559> <WH8804>, We be not able <WH3201> <WH8799> to go up <WH5927> <WH8800> against the people <WH5971>; for they are stronger <WH2389> than we.

And they brought up <WH3318> <WH8686> an evil report <WH1681> of the land <WH776> which they had searched <WH8446> <WH8804> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, The land <WH776>, through which we have gone <WH5674> <WH8804> to search <WH8446> <WH8800> it, is a land <WH776> that eateth up <WH398> <WH8802> the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> thereof; and all the people <WH5971> that we saw <WH7200> <WH8804> in it <WH8432> are men <WH582> of a great stature <WH4060>.

And there we saw <WH7200> <WH8804> the giants <WH5303>, the sons <WH1121> of Anak <WH6061>, which come of the giants <WH5303>: and we were in our own sight <WH5869> as grasshoppers <WH2284>, and so we were in their sight <WH5869>.
